title: New game Idea
body:
Riot Games,

A couple friends and I were thinking about the awesome universe you guys have set up with all of the lore and special interactions of Runeterra and the league of legends universe, and we think that it would be an amazing idea to make an open world game based around all the lore of champions in the league and Runeterra as well. I understand that you've probably had suggestions about this before and that it would be pretty difficult to do unless you made your workforce a lot larger in producing and managing such a large scale game without making a replica of skyrim or whatnot. and also another great idea i think like how you did the bilgewater event and "killed" gangplank with the help of the league community. There could be crossover events between the two games, lets say if Rek'sai {{champion:421}}  was a boss of the shuriman deserts and was injured enough a certain amount of times she might unavailable to play in league of legends as she is tending to her wounds. (if you made it an MMORPG) But otherwise I think it would be an amazing game to play even if it doesn't come to life, though i really hope it does as i think it would make you a lot of money so you can expand your business and be a fun game to play

Sincerely, Reaper9959

replies.body: The concept of having one game interact with another game is pretty good from a money making standpoint ( like how you play a game to unlock a certain skin or champ ) as people would want to unlock those types of things (completionist ya know), but I doubt Riot has any intention to do something like that, however would be a fun project for game designers as a hobby project! Nice Idea!!
